carpet.rule.infinitelyVault.desc: Players can open vaults an unlimited number of times
carpet.rule.comparatorDupeFix.desc: Fix the comparator item duplication glitch
carpet.rule.useLeavesAndMossAsFuel.desc: Leaves and moss can be used as fuel
carpet.rule.noEnchantmentLevelLimit.desc: Removes the level limit on enchantments
carpet.rule.noTooExpensive.desc: Removes the "Too Expensive" limit on enchantments
carpet.rule.showChainUpdateDepth.desc: When the depth of the update chain reaches 100,000, it will be displayed in the chat bar
carpet.rule.copperGolemFix.desc: Copper golems do not turn into statues in the air
Reintroduces the block entity swap functionality
carpet.rule.endPortalFrameCanBeMined.des: The end portal frame can be mined
carpet.rule.infinitelyVault.extra.0: This only applies to vaults that the player has not yet opened
carpet.rule.infinitelyTotem.extra.0: When a totem is used,it is not consumed
carpet.rule.useLeavesAndMossAsFuel.extra: Note: 1.21.2+ requires a server restart for change to take effect
carpet.rule.comparatorDupeFix.extra.0: Fix the comparator item duplication glitch
carpet.rule.noEnchantmentLevelLimit.extr: Enchantment level can reach 225 and it is recommended to use the noTooExpensive function
